## Specify the Methods

By the end of this module, you should be able to:

* Identify your target population and create a sampling plan
* Determine how many participants to invite
* Select the best method of data collection given study objectives and resources

## 4.1: Sampling

### Prepare

* Read Sections 1.3 and 1.4 of [OpenIntro Statistics](https://www.openintro.org/redirect.php?go=os4_tablet&referrer=/stat/os4.php){target="_blank"}
* Watch [this video on sampling from the DHS](https://youtu.be/DD5npelwh80){target="_blank"}
* Read the chapter on Power in *Running Randomized Evaluations* (Box)
